title: Explorer's ring 1

Advanced data
Item ID13125

The Explorer's ring 1 is a reward for completing all of the easy tasks in the Lumbridge & Draynor Diary and speaking to Hatius Cosaintus in Lumbridge.

Whenever the energy restore function is used, a message appears in the player's chatbox displaying how many uses are left for that day.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+1List

Benefits[edit | edit source]

  • 50% run energy replenish twice a day
  • Cast Low Level Alchemy (requires Magic level 21) without using any runes 30 times a day (however, this does not grant any Magic XP for casting)

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 December 2017
(update)

The Explorer's rings will now display how many charges remain after using them.

27 October 2016
(update)
  • The "Alchemy" option was added, allowing the free alchemy to be used regardless of which spellbook the player is using.
  • The "Recharge-energy" option was renamed to "Energy".
24 March 2016
(update | poll)
  • It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
8 October 2015
(update)

Adjusted the game message when the explorer's ring is out of run restore charges.

[[File:Explorer's ring 1 detail.png|150px|left]]
The '''Explorer's ring 1''' is a reward for completing all of the easy tasks in the [[Lumbridge & Draynor Diary]] and speaking to [[Hatius Cosaintus]] in [[Lumbridge]].

Whenever the energy restore function is used, a message appears in the player's chatbox displaying how many uses are left for that day.

==Benefits==
*50% [[run energy]] replenish twice a day
*Cast [[Low Level Alchemy]] (requires [[Magic]] level 21) without using any runes 30 times a day (however, this does not grant any Magic XP for casting)
